hero.title: Full Stack Developer & Game Creator
hero.tagline: Building seamless web apps and competitive multiplayer games.

xenora-rush.title: Xenova Rush
xenora-rush.summary: Competitive multiplayer game with fast-paced mobility and combat featuring 120Hz authoritative physics completely synchronized with local prediction and other advanced networking techniques.

taskmanager-pro.title: TaskManager Pro
taskmanager-pro.summary: Full-stack web application with team collaboration, project management, and real-time task tracking. Built with modern architecture and best practices.

brutoria.title: Brutoria
brutoria.summary: Mobile autobattler game featuring strategic gameplay and automated combat mechanics. Served as co-creator and senior developer, providing technical guidance and code architecture mentorship to the development team.

portfolio-site.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio-site.summary: Modern responsive portfolio showcasing professional work. Built with Next.js 15 App Router, featuring internationalization, dark/light themes, and smooth animations.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.tagline: Technologies and tools I work with

workInProgress.title: Work in Progress
workInProgress.message: This article is currently being written. Feel free to ask me personally about this topic if you want to know more details!

delta-compression.title: 10x Performance Improvement with Custom Delta Compression
delta-compression.summary: Optimized server-client data transmission by implementing custom Delta compression algorithms, achieving significant performance improvements for real-time synchronization in multiplayer applications.

local-prediction.title: Local Prediction & Server Reconciliation for Instant Feedback
local-prediction.summary: Implemented client-side prediction with server reconciliation to provide instant user feedback while maintaining server authority and preventing cheating in multiplayer games.

about.title: About Me
about.bio: I'm currently living in Spain and looking for remote work opportunities. I'm available and have a very flexible schedule, ready to adapt to different time zones and project needs.
